product_name: O'Neill Superlite Farmer John Wetsuit - Men's
long_description: Whether you're paddling, surfing or just playing in the water, the O'Neill Superlite Farmer John Wetsuit will help keep you warm. Stretchy 2mm neoprene forms to your body for a flexible, comfortable fit; flatseam construction prevents chafing. Zippered ankles ease dressing over footwear; reinforced knees resist abrasion. Stretch panels along calves enhance freedom of motion. Hand wash the O'Neill Superlite FarmerJohn Wetsuit in cold water, drip dry out of sun and store in a cool, dry place.
short_description: Whether you're paddling, surfing or just playing in the water, the O'Neill Superlite Farmer John Wetsuit will help keep you warm.
